_frame_metadata.forClaude: Check this file to understand what tasks are pending, in progress, or completed. Update task status as you work. Add new tasks when discovered during development. Follow the task recognition rules in CLAUDE.md. IMPORTANT: Include userRequest (original user prompt), detailed description, and acceptanceCriteria for each task.

taskSchema._comment: This schema shows the expected structure for each task
taskSchema.title: Short actionable title (max 60 chars)
taskSchema.description: Claude's detailed explanation - what, how, which files affected
taskSchema.acceptanceCriteria: When is this task done? Concrete testable criteria
